text.text_translated:
A rainforest is a very big forest. It has a lot of rain. It has many trees and animals.

Ed needed technology for his walk. His walk was not possible without it. He used a radio to talk to people in the rainforest. He asked them for food. He also asked to cross their land.

Many people came to meet him. They helped him find the way in difficult places. Ed wrote a blog during his walk. He wrote about what he did every day.

Newspapers and TV were interested in his trip. He used this to talk about a big problem. People were cutting down the trees in the rainforest. He also got money for special groups. These groups help nature and children in Brazil and Peru.
